00032 CNAnalysisMethodLOH::CNAnalysisMethodLOH()
00033 {
00034         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined = false;
00035 }

00037 /**
00038  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00039  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00040  * @return SelfDoc
00041  */
00042 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodLOH::explainSelf()
00043 {
00044     CNAnalysisMethodLOH obj;
00045     SelfDoc doc;
00046     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00047     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00048     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00049     return doc;
00050 }

00052 /**
00053  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00054  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00055  */
00056 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodLOH::getDefaultDocOptions()
00057 {
00058   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00059 
00060   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00061 
00062   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_errorrate = {"lohCN_errorrate", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Error Rate"};
00063   opts.push_back(lohCN_errorrate);
00064 
00065   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_beta = {"lohCN_beta", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.001", "0.001", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Beta"};
00066   opts.push_back(lohCN_beta);
00067 
00068   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_alpha = {"lohCN_alpha", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.01", "0.01", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Alpha"};
00069   opts.push_back(lohCN_alpha);
00070 
00071   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_separation = {"lohCN_separation", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1000000", "1000000", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Separation"};
00072   opts.push_back(lohCN_separation);
00073 
00074   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_nMinMarkers = {"lohCN_nMinMarkers", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "10", "10", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Minimum Marker Count"};
00075   opts.push_back(lohCN_nMinMarkers);
00076 
00077   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_NoCallThreshold = {"lohCN_NoCallThreshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN No Call Threshold"};
00078   opts.push_back(lohCN_NoCallThreshold);
00079 
00080   SelfDoc::Opt lohCN_MinGenomicSpan = {"lohCN_minGenomicSpan", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1000000", "1000000", "NA", "NA", "LOH CN Minimum Genomic Span"};
00081   opts.push_back(lohCN_MinGenomicSpan);
00082 
00083   return opts;
00084 }

00086 /**
00087  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00088  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00089  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00090  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00091  *
00092  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00093  *
00094  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00095  */
00096 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodLOH::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00097 {
00098     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00099     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00100     CNAnalysisMethodLOH* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodLOH();
00101     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00102 
00103     pMethod->m_dLohCNErrorRate = setupDoubleParameter("lohCN_errorrate", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00104     pMethod->m_dLohCNBeta = setupDoubleParameter("lohCN_beta", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00105     pMethod->m_dLohCNAlpha = setupDoubleParameter("lohCN_alpha", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00106     pMethod->m_iLohCNSeparation = setupIntParameter("lohCN_separation", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00107     pMethod->m_iLohCNMinimumMarkerCount = setupIntParameter("lohCN_nMinMarkers", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00108     pMethod->m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("lohCN_NoCallThreshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00109     pMethod->m_iLohCNMinGenomicSpan = setupIntParameter("lohCN_minGenomicSpan", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00110 
00111     return pMethod;
00112 }

00114 /**
00115  * @brief run the analysis
00116  */
00117 void CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run()
00118 {
00119     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run(...) start");
00120     isSetup();
00121     getEngine()->setOpt("minSegSeparation", ::getInt(m_iLohCNSeparation));
00122 
00123     determineLocalProbeSets();
00124 
00125         std::vector<char> vHomHet(getProbeSets()->size());
00126     int iMarkerCount = 0;
00127     int iHetCutoff = 0;
00128     if (!lohPreProcessing(vHomHet, iMarkerCount, iHetCutoff)) {throw(Except("LohPreProcessing failed."));}
00129     int iLastChromosome = getProbeSets()->at(getProbeSets()->size() - 1)->getChromosome();
00130 //    Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run(...) ", iLastChromosome, 1, iLastChromosome);
00131     for (int iChromosome = 1; (iChromosome <= iLastChromosome); iChromosome++)
00132     {
00133         try
00134         {
00135 //        Verbose::progressStep(1);
00136         int iChromosomeProbeSetCount = 0;
00137         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00138         {
00139             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00140             if ((vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0) && (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00141             {
00142                 iChromosomeProbeSetCount++;
00143             }
00144         }
00145         std::vector<char> vChromosomeGenotypeCalls(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00146         std::vector<int> vChromosomePositions(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00147         std::vector<int> vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00148         int iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00149         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00150         {
00151             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00152             if ((vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0) && (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00153             {
00154                 vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iProbeSetIndex] = vHomHet[iIndex];
00155                 vChromosomePositions[iProbeSetIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00156                 vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iProbeSetIndex] = iIndex;
00157                 iProbeSetIndex++;
00158             }
00159         }
00160         int iStartIndex = 0;
00161         for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex <= iChromosomeProbeSetCount); iIndex++)
00162         {
00163             if ((iIndex == iChromosomeProbeSetCount) || ((getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex])->getPosition() - getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex - 1])->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation))
00164             {
00165                 int iSegmentProbeSetCount = ((iIndex - 1) - iStartIndex + 1);
00166                 if (iSegmentProbeSetCount >= iMarkerCount)
00167                 {
00168                     std::vector<char> vSegmentGenotypeCalls(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00169                     std::vector<int> vSegmentPositions(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00170                     std::vector<char> vLoh(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00171                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00172                     {
00173                         vSegmentGenotypeCalls[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00174                         vSegmentPositions[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomePositions[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00175                     }
00176                     lohFind(vSegmentGenotypeCalls, vSegmentPositions, iMarkerCount, iHetCutoff, m_iLohCNMinGenomicSpan, vLoh);
00177                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00178                     {
00179                         getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex])->setLoh(vLoh[iSegmentIndex]);
00180                     }
00181                 }
00182                 iStartIndex = iIndex;
00183             }
00184         }
00185         }
00186         catch(...) {Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run(...) Working on Chromosome " + ::getInt(iChromosome)); throw;}
00187     }
00188 
00189 //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00190     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run(...) end");
00191 }
00192 
00193 /**
00194  * @brief Preprocess the genotype calls to get the marker count cutoff and the het call cutoff
00195  * @param std::vector<char>& - The vector of hom and/or het calls
00196  * @param int& - The marker count cutoff to calculate
00197  * @param int& - The het call cutoff to calculate
00198  * @return bool - Was the function successful or not (true = successful)
00199  */
00200 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOH::lohPreProcessing(     std::vector<char>& vHomHet, 
00201                                                 int& iMarkerCount, 
00202                                                 int& iHetCutoff)
00203 {
00204     int iHetCount = 0;
00205     int iCallCount = 0;
00206     int iNoCallCount = 0;
00207     double dMaximumGenotypeConfidence = 0;
00208     int iSnpCount = 0;
00209     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00210     {
00211         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00212         pobjProbeSet->setLoh(numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
00213         if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {iSnpCount++;}
00214         vHomHet[iIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall();
00215         if (vHomHet[iIndex] == (char)2) {vHomHet[iIndex] = (char)0;}
00216         if (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence() > m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold) {vHomHet[iIndex] = (char)-1;}
00217         if (vHomHet[iIndex] == 1) {iHetCount++;}
00218         if (vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0)
00219         {
00220             iCallCount++;
00221             dMaximumGenotypeConfidence = Max((float)dMaximumGenotypeConfidence, pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence());
00222         }
00223         else
00224         {
00225             if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {iNoCallCount++;}
00226         }
00227     }
00228     double dErrorRate = m_dLohCNErrorRate;
00229     if (((dMaximumGenotypeConfidence * 1.1) >= m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold) && (m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold == 0.05))
00230     {
00231         dErrorRate = ((double)iNoCallCount / (double)iSnpCount);
00232         dErrorRate = (0.002926 + 6.607106 * dErrorRate);
00233         dErrorRate = ceil(dErrorRate * 100) / 100.0;
00234         if (dErrorRate < m_dLohCNErrorRate) {dErrorRate = m_dLohCNErrorRate;}
00235     }
00236     double dHetRate = ((double)iHetCount / (double) iCallCount);
00237     if (dHetRate > 0.5) {dHetRate = 0.5;}
00238     if (dHetRate < 0.2) {dHetRate = 0.2;}
00239     int iIterations = 1;
00240     int iStart = 20;
00241     int n = 0;
00242     while (iIterations < 3)
00243     {
00244         iHetCutoff = AffxStatistics::binoinv((1 - m_dLohCNAlpha), iStart, dErrorRate);
00245         double a = AffxStatistics::norminv(m_dLohCNBeta);
00246         double sqrtn = (-a * 0.5 * sqrt(1 - dHetRate) / sqrt(dHetRate) + sqrt(a * a * (1 - dHetRate) / (4 * dHetRate) + iHetCutoff / dHetRate));
00247         n = (int)ceil(sqrtn * sqrtn);
00248         if (n == iStart) {break;}
00249         else {iStart = n;}
00250         iIterations++;
00251     }
00252     iMarkerCount = Max(n, m_iLohCNMinimumMarkerCount);
00253     if ((iMarkerCount % 2) == 0) {iMarkerCount++;}
00254     if (iMarkerCount < 3)
00255     {
00256         throw(Except("MarkerCount must be >= 3.")); return false;
00257     }
00258     return true;
00259 }
00260 
00261 /**
00262  * @brief Find the runs off LOH
00263  * @param std::vector<char>& - The genotype calls
00264  * @param std::vector<int>& - The chromosome positions
00265  * @param int - The marker count cutoff
00266  * @param int - The het call cutoff
00267  * @param int - The minimum genomic span for a run of LOH
00268  * @param std::vector<char>& - The resulting LOH calls (1 = LOH, 0 = !LOH)
00269  */
00270 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOH::lohFind(      std::vector<char>& vGenotypeCalls, 
00271                                         std::vector<int>& vPositions, 
00272                                         int iMarkerCount, 
00273                                         int iHetCutoff, 
00274                                         int iMinGenomicSpan, 
00275                                         std::vector<char>& vLoh)
00276 {
00277     int iWindowCenter = (int)floor(iMarkerCount / 2.0);
00278     if ((iWindowCenter * 2) != iMarkerCount - 1) {throw(Except("Window size must be odd.")); return false;}
00279     int iCurrentState = 0;
00280     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vLoh.size()); iIndex++)
00281     {
00282         vLoh[iIndex] = 0;
00283     }
00284     int iStateLoh = 1;
00285     int iStateNonLoh = 0;
00286     std::vector<int> vHetCount(vGenotypeCalls.size());
00287     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vGenotypeCalls.size()); iIndex++)
00288     {
00289         vHetCount[iIndex] = 0;
00290         if ((vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] != 0) && (vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] != 1))
00291         {
00292             throw(Except("LOH Failed")); return false;
00293         }
00294     }
00295     int iCurrentCallIndex = iWindowCenter;
00296     int iWindowOffset = iWindowCenter - iHetCutoff - 1;
00297     if (iWindowOffset < 1) {throw(Except("LOH Failed")); return false;}
00298     int iLastCallIndex = (int)vGenotypeCalls.size() - iWindowCenter - 1;
00299     int iCount = 0;
00300     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iMarkerCount); iIndex++)
00301     {
00302         if (vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] == 1) {iCount++;}
00303     }
00304     vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = iCount;
00305 
00306 
00307     while (iCurrentCallIndex < iLastCallIndex)
00308     {
00309         int iPrevCallIndex = iCurrentCallIndex;
00310         if (vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] >= iHetCutoff)
00311         {
00312             if (iCurrentState == 1)
00313             {
00314                 // in a LOH region transitioning back to non-LOH
00315                 // Change back to non-LOH state
00316                 // really now need to fill in from
00317                 // iPrevCallIndex-1:iPrevCallIndex+iWindowOffset -1 as also LOH
00318                 iCurrentState = 0;
00319                 int iMinCallIndex = Max(0, iPrevCallIndex - 1);
00320                 int iMaxCallIndex = iPrevCallIndex - 1;
00321                 int iHetsSeen = 0;
00322                 // starting from the window center go out as far as the
00323                 // second het or the end of the window which ever occurs first
00324                 // Take special care to stop at the last hom
00325                 while ((iHetsSeen < 2) && (iMaxCallIndex < iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset - 1) && (iMaxCallIndex < iLastCallIndex))
00326                 {
00327                     iMaxCallIndex = Min(iMaxCallIndex + 1, iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset - 1);
00328                     if (vGenotypeCalls[iMaxCallIndex] == 1)
00329                     {
00330                         iHetsSeen++;
00331                         if (iHetsSeen == 2)
00332                         {
00333                             iMaxCallIndex--;
00334                             if (vGenotypeCalls[iMaxCallIndex] == 1)
00335                             {
00336                                 iMaxCallIndex--;
00337                             }
00338                         }
00339                     }
00340                 }
00341                 for (int iIndex = iMinCallIndex; (iIndex <= iMaxCallIndex); iIndex++)
00342                 {
00343                     vLoh[iIndex] = iStateLoh;
00344                 }
00345                 if (iLastCallIndex >= (iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset))
00346                 {
00347                     for (int iIndex = (iPrevCallIndex + 1); (iIndex <= (iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset)); iIndex++)
00348                     {
00349                         vHetCount[iIndex] = vHetCount[iIndex - 1] - vGenotypeCalls[iIndex - 1 - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iIndex + iWindowCenter];
00350                     }
00351                 }
00352             }
00353             else
00354             {
00355                 // in a non-LOH region and not transitioning, move to the next marker
00356                 iCurrentCallIndex++;
00357                 vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] - vGenotypeCalls[iPrevCallIndex - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iCurrentCallIndex + iWindowCenter];
00358             }
00359         }
00360         else
00361         {
00362             if (iCurrentState == 0)
00363             {
00364                 // if we are transitioning to the LOH state then we should
00365                 // mark back to the start of the Window as LOH
00366                 iCurrentState = 1;
00367                 int iMinCallIndex = iPrevCallIndex;
00368                 int iHetsSeen = 0;
00369                 // starting from the window center go out as far as the
00370                 // second het or the end of the window which ever occurs first
00371                 // Take special care to stop at the last hom
00372                 while ((iHetsSeen < 2) && (iMinCallIndex > (iPrevCallIndex - iWindowOffset)) && (iMinCallIndex > 0))
00373                 {
00374                     iMinCallIndex = Max(iMinCallIndex - 1, 0);
00375                     if (vGenotypeCalls[iMinCallIndex] == 1)
00376                     {
00377                         iHetsSeen++;
00378                         if (iHetsSeen == 2)
00379                         {
00380                             iMinCallIndex++;
00381                             if (vGenotypeCalls[iMinCallIndex] == 1)
00382                             {
00383                                 iMinCallIndex++;
00384                             }
00385                         }
00386                     }
00387                 }
00388                 for (int iIndex = iMinCallIndex; (iIndex <= iCurrentCallIndex); iIndex++)
00389                 {
00390                     vLoh[iIndex] = iStateLoh; // we know definitively that these are LOH
00391                 }
00392                 // we could also make a guess about those that are
00393                 // following but instead we will move forward
00394                 // conservatively
00395             }
00396             vLoh[iCurrentCallIndex] = iStateLoh;
00397             iCurrentCallIndex++;
00398             vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] - vGenotypeCalls[iPrevCallIndex - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iCurrentCallIndex + iWindowCenter];
00399         }
00400     }
00401     // deal with markers that don't have a full window around them
00402     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iWindowCenter); iIndex++)
00403     {
00404         vLoh[iIndex] = vLoh[iWindowCenter + 1];
00405     }
00406     for (int iIndex = iCurrentCallIndex; (iIndex < (int)vLoh.size()); iIndex++)
00407     {
00408         vLoh[iIndex] = vLoh[iCurrentCallIndex-1];
00409     }
00410 
00411     // We move up the segment until iBeginIndex points to the first marker having iStateLoh.
00412     int iBeginIndex =0;
00413     while(iBeginIndex < vLoh.size() && vLoh[iBeginIndex] != iStateLoh )
00414     {
00415         iBeginIndex++;
00416     }
00417     if(iBeginIndex == vLoh.size())
00418     {
00419         return true;
00420     }
00421 
00422     int iSegmentStartIndex=iBeginIndex;
00423     int iStartPosition=vPositions[iBeginIndex];
00424     int iPreviousState = vLoh[iBeginIndex];
00425     int iPreviousPosition=vPositions[iBeginIndex];
00426 
00427     for(int iIndex=iBeginIndex+1; iIndex < vLoh.size(); iIndex++)
00428     {
00429 
00430         int iPresentPosition = vPositions[iIndex];
00431         int iPresentState = vLoh[iIndex];
00432 
00433         // Case 1:  We have hit the end of the segment.    
00434         if(iIndex == vPositions.size()-1)
00435         {
00436              // SubCase a: In this case the state of the final marker is the same as the state of the penultimate marker
00437             // and this state is LOH but the length of the region is small.
00438             if(     iPresentState == iPreviousState  &&
00439                     iPresentState == iStateLoh          &&
00440                     iPresentPosition-iStartPosition < iMinGenomicSpan)
00441             {
00442                 for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < vPositions.size(); iNewIndex++)
00443                 {
00444                     vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00445                 }
00446             }
00447              // SubCase b: In this case the state of the final marker is non-loh, but the penultimate is LOH.
00448              // Also the region of LOH is small we set it to non-loh
00449             if(     iPreviousState == iStateLoh          &&
00450                     iPresentState == iStateNonLoh          &&
00451                     iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition < iMinGenomicSpan)
00452             {
00453                 for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < vPositions.size(); iNewIndex++)
00454                 {
00455                     vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00456                 }
00457             }
00458             // SubCase c:  In this case the final marker is LOH and penultimate is non-Loh.  
00459             //We set the final marker to non-LOH.
00460             if(     iPreviousState == iStateNonLoh          &&
00461                     iPresentState == iStateLoh)
00462             {
00463                 vLoh[iPresentPosition] = iStateNonLoh;
00464             }
00465             break;
00466         }
00467 
00468         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00469                 iPresentState == iStateNonLoh      &&
00470                 iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition >  iMinGenomicSpan)
00471         {
00472             int i=0;
00473             i++;
00474         }
00475 
00476         // Case 2:  We have changed state at the end of an LOH region into a non-LOH region  
00477         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00478                 iPresentState == iStateNonLoh      &&
00479                 iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition <  iMinGenomicSpan)
00480         {
00481             for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < iIndex; iNewIndex++)
00482             {
00483                 vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00484             }
00485         }
00486 
00487          // Case 3:  We have changed state at the end of a non-Loh region into an LOH region.  
00488          // So we reset the iStartPosition and iSegmentStartIndex.
00489         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00490                 iPresentState == iStateLoh)
00491         {
00492             iStartPosition = iPresentPosition;
00493             iSegmentStartIndex = iIndex;
00494         }
00495 
00496         iPreviousPosition = iPresentPosition;
00497         iPreviousState = iPresentState;
00498     }
00499 
00500 
00501 
00502     return true;
00503 }
00504 
00505 void CNAnalysisMethodLOH::determineLocalProbeSets()
00506 {
00507     if (m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined) {return;}
00508     int iNumberOfProbeSets = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00509     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00510     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iNumberOfProbeSets); iIndex++)
00511     {
00512                 if (isCytoScanHD)
00513                 {
00514                         if (CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsSNP() )
00515                         {
00516                                 getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00517                         }
00518                 }
00519                 else
00520                 {
00521                         getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00522                 }
00523     }
00524     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined = true;
00525 }
